issue.title: fix gzip + chunked encoding reuse of connection

repository.name: reqwest
repository.description: An easy and powerful Rust HTTP Client

issue.title: gzip not reuse the connection

labels.name: B-upstream
labels.description: Blocked: upstream. Depends on a dependency to make a change first.

repository.name: reqwest
repository.description: An easy and powerful Rust HTTP Client

issue.body:
when gzip enabled will not reuse the connection, disable gzip will reuse the connection.

use ***response.text().await*** read the body

version: 0.10.4
